graph_title: Percentage of facilities and services certified as universal accessibility
indicator_name: Percentage of facilities and services certified as universal accessibility
SDG_GOAL: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status
SDG_INDICATOR: Percentage of facilities and services certified as universal accessibility
indicator_level: Process (offer information about the effort, resources, decisions and actions that the UPO is making to comply with the SDG)
